title: Back room of the sky
creator_contributor_role: Rank Organisation Film Productions, production company
subject_group: Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Airplanes - Design and construction
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Accidents - Prevention
description: Episode of Series "Look at Life". A survey of work carried out at the Ministry of Aviation Research Centre at Boscombe Down. Aiming always for increased safety and efficiency, all sections of a new aircraft must be rigorously tested and teams of pilots, scientists and engineers seek out any flaws which must be corrected before a machine becomes operational. The men who will fly the aircraft are also seen undergoing tests at Boscombe Down. Narrated by Raymond Baxter.
